channel.title: CVE Feed for ovirt-engine-sdk-python -- ovirt-engine-sdk-python
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ovirt-engine-sdk-python -- ovirt-engine-sdk-python

item.title: CVE-2014-0161|2024-08-06T09:05:38.992Z -- ovirt-engine-sdk-python -- ovirt-engine-sdk-python
item.description: ovirt-engine-sdk-python before 3.4.0.7 and 3.5.0.4 does not verify that the hostname of the remote endpoint matches the Common Name (CN) or subjectAltName as specified by its x.509 certificate in a TLS/SSL session. This could allow man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof remote endpoints via an arbitrary valid certificate.
